Verses: 1 avar Thiralaana Janangalaik Kandu Malaiyin Mel Erinaar; Avar Utkaarndhapozhudhu, Avarudaiya Seeshargal Avaridaththil Vandhaargal.
2  Appozhudhu Avar Thamadhu Vaayaith Thirandhu Avargalukku Ubathesiththu Sonnadhu Ennavendraal:
3  Aaviyil Elimaiyullavargal Baakkiyavaangal; Paralogaraajyam Avargaludaiyadhu.
4 thuyarappadukiravargal Baakkiyavaangal; Avargal Aarudhaladaivaargal.
5  Saandhakunamullavargal Baakkiyavaangal; Avargal Boomiyai Sudhandhariththukkolluvaargal.
6  Needhiyinmel Pasithaakamullavargal Baakkiyavaangal; Avargal Thirupdhiyadaivaargal.
7  Irakkamudaiyavargal Baakkiyavaangal; Avarkal Irakkam Peruvaargal.
8 irudhayaththil Suththamullavargal Baakkiyavaangal; Avargal Thevanaith Tharisippaargal.
9 samaadhaanam Pannukiravargal Baakkiyavaangal; Avargal Thevanudaiya Puththirar Ennappatuvaargal.
10 needhiyinimiththam Thunpappatugiravargal Baakkiyavaangal; Paralokaraajyam Avargaludaiyadhu.
11  Ennimiththam Ungalai Nindhiththuth Thunpappaduththi, Palavidha Theemaiyaana Mozhigalaiyum Ungalperil Poiyaai Solvaargalaanaal Baakkiyavaankalaayiruppeergal.
12  Sandhoshappattu, Kalikoorungal; Paralokaththil Ungal Balan Migudhiyaayirukkum; Ungalukku Munnirundha Theerkkadharisigalaiyum Appadiye Thunpappaduththinaargale.
13  Neengal Boomikku Uppaayirukkireergal; Uppaanadhu Saaramatrupponaal, Edhinaal Saaramaakkappadum? Veliye Kottappatuvadharkum, Manusharaal Midhikkappaduvadharkume Ozhiya Verondrukkum Udhavaadhu.
14 neengal Ulagaththukku Velichchamaayirukkireergal; Malaiyin Mel Irukkira Pattanam Maraindhirukkamaattaadhu.
15 vilakkaik Koluththi Marakkaalaal Moodivaikkaamal, Vilakkuth Thandinmel Vaippaargal; Appozhudhu Adhu Veettilulla Yaavarukkum Velichcham Kodukkum.
16  Ivvidhamaai, Manushar Ungal Narkiriyaikalaikkandu, Paralokaththilirukkira Ungal Pidhaavai Magimaippaduththumpadi, Ungal Velichcham Avargal Munbaagap Pirakaasikkakkadavadhu.
17 niyaayappiramaanaththaiyaanaalum Theerkkadharisanangalaiyaanaalum Azhikkiradharku Vandhen Endru Ennikkollaadheyungal; Azhikkiradharku Alla, Niraivetrukiradharke Vandhen.

18  Vaanamum Boomiyum Ozhindhuponaalum, Niyaayappiramaanaththilulladhellaam Niraiverumalavum, Adhil Oru Siru Ezhuththaagilum, Oru Ezhuththin Uruppaagilum Ozhindhu Pogaadhu Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.

19  Aagaiyaal, Indhak Karpanaigal Ellaavatrilum Siridhondraiyaagilum Meeri, Avvidhamaai Manusharukkup Podhikkiravan Paralokaraajyaththil Ellaarilum Siriyavan Ennappaduvaan; Ivaikalaik Kaikkontu Podhikkiravan Paralokaraajyaththil Periyavan Ennappaduvaan.
20 vedhapaaragar Pariseyar Enpavargaludaiya Needhiyilum Ungal Needhi Adhigamaayiraavittaal, Paralogaraajyaththil Piravesikkamaatteergal Endru Ungalukku Sollukiren.
21  Kolai Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga Enpadhum, Kolaiseygiravan Niyaayaththeerppukku Edhuvaayiruppaan Enpadhum, Poorvaththaarukku Uraikkappattadhendru Kelvippattirukkireergal.

22  Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren; Than Sagodharanai Niyaayamillaamal Kobiththukkollukiravan Niyaayaththeerppukku Edhuvaayiruppaan; Than Sagodharanai Veenanendru Sollugiravan Aalosanai Sangaththeerppukku Edhuvaayiruppaan; Moodane Endru Sollugiravan Erinaragaththirku Edhuvaayiruppaan.
23 aagaiyaal, Nee Palipeedaththinidaththil Un Kaanikkaiyaich Seluththa Vandhu, Un Peril Un Sagodharanukkuk Kurai Undendru Ange Ninaivu Kooruvaayaagil,
24  Angedhaane Palipeetaththin Mun Un Kaanikkaiyai Vaiththuvittup Poi, Munbu Un Sakodharanote Oppuravaagi, Pinbu Vandhu Un Kaanikkaiyai Seluththu.

25 edhiraali Unnai Niyaayaadhipadhiyinidaththil Oppukkodaamalum, Niyaayaadhipadhi Unnai Sevaganitaththil Oppukkodaamalum, Nee Siraichchaalaiyil Vaikkappadaamalum Irukkumpadiyaaga, Nee Un Edhiraaliyodu Vazhiyil Irukkumpodhe Seekkiramaai Avanudane Nalmanam Porundhu.
26  Porundhaavittaal, Nee Oru Kaasum Kuraivindrik Koduththuth Theerkkumattum Avvitaththilirundhu Purappatamaattaai Endru, Meyyaakave Unakku Sollukiren.
27 vipasaaranj Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga Enpadhu Poorvaththaarukku Uraikkappattadhendru Kelvippattirukkireergal.
28  Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren Oru Sthireeyai Ichchaiyodu Paarkkira Evanum Than Irudhayaththil Avalode Vipasaaranjeydhaayitru.

29  Un Valadhu Kan Unakku Idaraluntaakkinaal, Adhaip Pidungi Erindhu Podu; Un Sareeram Muzhuvadhum Narakaththil Thallappaduvadhaippaarkkilum, Un Avayavangalil Ondru Kettuppovadhu Unakku Nalamaayirukkum.

30  Un Valadhu Kai Unakku Idaraluntaakkinaal, Adhaith Thariththu Erindhu Podu; Un Sareeram Muzhuvadhum Narakaththil Thallappaduvadhaippaarkkilum, Un Avayavangalil Ondru Kettuppovadhu Unakku Nalamaayirukkum.
31 than Manaiviyaith Thallividukira Evanum Thalludharseettai Avalukku Kodukkakkadavan Endru Uraikkappattadhu.

32 naan Ungalukku Sollugiren; Vesiththana Mugaandharaththinaalozhiya Than Manaiviyaith Thallividugiravan, Avalai Vibasaaranjeyyappannukiravanaayiruppaan; Appadith Thallividappattavalai Vivaagam Pannugiravanum Vibasaaranjeygiravanaayiruppaan.
33 andriyum, Poiyaanaiyidaamal Un Aanaigalaik Karththar Munnilaiyaai Seluththuvaayaaga Endru Poorvaththaarukku Uraikkappattadhendru Kelvippattirukkireergal.
34 naan Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Parichchedham Saththiyampannavendaam; Vaanaththin Peril Saththiyampannaventaam, Adhu Dhevanudaiya Singaasanam.
35 boomiyin Perilum Saththiyampannavendaam, Adhu Dhevanudaiya Paadhapadi; Erusalemin Perilum Saththiyampannaventaam, Adhu Makaaraajaavin Nagaram.
36  Un Sirasin Perilum Saththiyampannavendaam, Adhin Oru Mayiraiyaavadhu Venmaiyaakkavum Karuppaakkavum Unnaal Koodaadhe.
37  Ulladhai Ulladhendrum, Illadhai Illadhendrum Sollungal; Idharku Minjinadhu Theemaiyinaal Undaayirukkum.
38  Kannukkuk Kan, Pallukku Pal Endru Uraikkappattadhaik Kelvippattirukkireergal.
39  Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren; Theemaiyodu Edhirththu Nirkavendaam; Oruvan Unnai Valadhu Kannaththil Araindhaal, Avanukku Maru Kannaththaiyum Thiruppik Kodu.
40 unnodu Vazhakkaadi Un Vasthiraththai Eduththukkollavendumendrirukkiravanukku Un Angiyaiyum Vittuvidu.
41  Oruvan Unnai Oru Mail Thooram Varap Palavandham Panninaal, Avanodu Irandu Mail Thooram Po.
42 unnidaththil Ketkiravanukkuk Kodu, Unnidaththil Kadan Vaanga Virumbukiravanukku Mugangonaadhe.
43 unakkaduththavanai Snegiththu, Un Saththuruvaip Pagaippaayaaga Endru Sollappattadhaik Kelvippattirukkireergal.

44 naan Ungalukkuch Sollugiren, Ungal Saththurukkalaich Sinegiyungal; Ungalaich Sabikkiravargalai Aaseervadhiyungal; Ungalaip Pagaikkiravargalukku Nanmai Seyyungal; Ungalai Nindhikkiravargalukkaagavum Ungalaith Thunpappaduththukiravargalukkaagavum Jebam Pannungal.

45 ippadi Seyvadhinaal Neengal Paralogaththilirukkira Ungal Parama Pidhaavukku Puththiraraayiruppeergal; Avar Theeyor Melum Nallor Melum Thamadhu Sooriyanai Udhikkappanni, Needhiyullavargal Melum Aneedhiyullavargal Melum Mazhaiyaip Peyyappannugiraar.
46 ungalai Snekikkiravarkalaiye Neengal Snekippeerkalaanaal, Ungalukkup Palan Enna? Aayakkaararum Appatiye Seykiraargal Allavaa?
47  Ungal Sagodhararaimaaththiram Vaazhththuveergalaanaal, Neengal Viseshiththuch Seygiradhu Enna? Aayakkaararum Appadichseykiraargalallavaa?
48 aagaiyaal, Paralogaththilirukkira Ungal Pidhaa Poorana Sarkunaraayirukkiradhupola, Neengalum Poorana Sarkunaraayirukkakkataveergal.
